casebody.data:
Petrie and Bertha THOMPSON
v.
The CENTER FOR PEDIATRIC AND ADOLESCENT MEDICINE, L.L.C., Bernard Gaudin, PNP, Henry M. Peltier, M.D., Louisiana Medical Mutual Insurance Company, and American Casualty Company OP Reading, Pennsylvania NO. 2018-C-0583 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 1, 2018 Denied. WEIMER, J., recused.

CLARK, J., would grant.
